sources.title: Malice in the Palace
sources.description: Title: Malice in the Palace Summary: Set in a desert land where the stooges run a restaurant, the boys set out to recover the stolen Rootin Tootin diamond after they learn from the thieves that the Emir of Shmo has absconded ... Directed by: Jules White Actors: Moe Howard, Larry Fine, Shemp Howard Production Company: Columbia Pictures Release Date: 1 September 1949 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Set in a desert land where the stooges run a restaurant, the boys set out to recover the stolen Rootin Tootin diamond after they learn from the thieves that the Emir of Shmo has absconded with the contraband jewel. They journey to the stronghold of Shmo where they disguise as Santa Clauses and scare the ruler into giving them the diamond.

sources.title: Malice in the Palace (1949)
sources.description: Set in a desert land where the stooges run a restaurant, the boys set out to recover the stolen Rootin Tootin diamond after they learn from the thieves that the Emir of Shmo has absconded with the contraband jewel. They journey to the stronghold of Shmo where they disguise as Santa Clauses and scare the ruler into giving them the diamond. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/malice-in-the-palace-1949/

sources.title: Malice In The Palace (1949) [Colorized, 4K, Colorized]
sources.description: Malice In The Palace is a 1949  black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com   Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io   A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org   GPU: Google Colab. This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

sources.title: The Three Stooges Malice In The Palace (1949) Colorized Enhanced
sources.description: “Malice in the Palace” (1949) The Stooges land a job at a grand Middle Eastern palace, hoping for easy work and good pay. As usual, their clumsiness turns a lavish banquet into complete chaos, with flying food, mistaken identities, and pratfalls everywhere. Hilarity escalates when they unwittingly tangle with palace guards and guests. Classic Stooge slapstick ensures nonstop laughs from start to finish. Colorized then zapped with digital enhancements, as God intended...

metadata.Plot: Set in a desert land where the stooges run a restaurant, the boys set out to recover the stolen Rootin Tootin diamond after they learn from the thieves that the Emir of Shmo has absconded with the contraband jewel. They journey to the stronghold of Shmo where they disguise as Santa Clauses and scare the ruler into giving them the diamond.
